summary: Completed testing of Avida classifieds app - multiple UI fixes. Backend APIs working, Feature Settings API returning correct defaults (TZ-only location), category pages loading with images, subcategories showing on mobile. Found issues with All button dropdown not working and categories not displaying in 2 rows on desktop.

ui_bugs.issue: All button does NOT show dropdown modal - clicking navigates instead of opening category dropdown
Categories NOT displayed in 2 rows on desktop - showing single horizontal scrollable row instead

action_items: Fix All button to show dropdown modal instead of navigating when clicked on desktop
Verify HomeDesktopHeader component is being rendered correctly with 2-row category layout
critical_code_review_comments: HomeDesktopHeader.tsx defines 2-row category layout with ROW1_CATEGORIES and ROW2_CATEGORIES but UI shows single scrollable row - component may not be rendering or styles not applied
The All button has onClick={() => setShowCategoryModal(true)} but modal doesn't appear - check if showCategoryModal state and modal rendering are correct
context_for_next_testing_agent: All button dropdown and 2-row categories on desktop need verification. HomeDesktopHeader component code looks correct but UI behavior differs. Backend APIs all working. Mobile subcategories working. Similar Listings heart icon position fix verified - now in content column.

features_verified.category_page_loads_with_images: PASS - Images display correctly on category pages
features_verified.search_field_visible: PASS - Search field present in header
features_verified.feature_settings_api: PASS - Returns correct defaults including TZ-only location
features_verified.home_page_desktop: PARTIAL - Categories visible but not in 2 rows
features_verified.all_button_dropdown: FAIL - No dropdown shown, acts as navigation instead
features_verified.subcategories_mobile: PASS - Visible as horizontal pills on category page
features_verified.heart_icon_similar_listings: PASS - Moved to content column per code review
features_verified.admin_dashboard_login: PASS - Login working with provided credentials
features_verified.location_picker: PASS - Modal opens and shows All Locations
